item.title: Lunar server?
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

ok well i found the lunar spells…look:

[code][case 46165: //Lunar - Dummies Teleport
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if(absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
else //if (absY <= 3672)
{

	teleportToX = 3252;
teleportToY = 3433;
heightLevel = 0;
stillgfx(197, absY, absX);
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage("Welcome to the Training Area!");
}
}
	break;

case 16191: //Lunar - Cure Me
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 39)) {
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
sendMessage(“The Gods rid you of Poison.”);
stillgfx(436, absY, absX);
lunarTimer = 300;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 40) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 40 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a regular Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16192: //Lunar - Cure Group
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 46)) {
CureGroup(436, 2);
lunarTimer = 300;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 47) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 47 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a regular Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16193: //Lunar - Boost Attack
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 51)) {
stillgfx(311, absY, absX);
playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 7;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Attack by 7 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 52) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 52 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boositng Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16194: //Lunar - Boost Strength
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 53)) {
stillgfx(310, absY, absX);
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += 7;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Strength by 7 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 54) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 54 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boositng Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 43126: //Lunar - Boost Defence
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 56)) {
stillgfx(333, absY, absX);
playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
playerLevel[1] += 7;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[1]+"", 4008);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Defence by 7 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 57) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 57 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boositng Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16195: //Lunar - Boost Ranged
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 64)) {
stillgfx(255, absY, absX);
playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
playerLevel[4] += 7;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[4]+"", 4010);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Ranged by 7 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 65) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 65 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boositng Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16196: //Lunar - Boost Magic
checkLunarStage();
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 66)) {
stillgfx(503, absY, absX);
playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
playerLevel[6] += 7;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[6]+"", 4014);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Magic by 7 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 67) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 67 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16197: //Lunar - Check Others HP
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 69)) {
sendMessage(“This spell is currently being made. Try again when the server is updated.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 70) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a regular Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16198: //Lunar - Food Fill
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 73)) {
if(LogoutDelay == 0) {
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
addItem(391, 1);
stillgfx(474, absY, absX);
lunarTimer = 300;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 74) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 74 to cast this spell”);
} else if((lunarTimer >= 1) && (LogoutDelay == 0)) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a regular Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
} else if(LogoutDelay >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You cannot use this spell whilst in combat.”);
}
}
}
break;
case 16199: //Lunar - Special Regain
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((specregainTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 73)) {
//specBar += 3;
stillgfx(292, absY, absX);
sendMessage(“You regain 25% of your Special Attack Bar.”);
//getFilling();
//resetBar();
//specregainTimer = 1200;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 80) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast this Lunar Spell once every Two Minutes.”);
}
}
break;
case 16200: //Lunar - Heal
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 84)) {
sendMessage(“You regain a mere 30 Hitpoints.”);
stillgfx(441, absY, absX);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
NewHP += 30;
lunarTimer = 300;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 85) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 85 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a regular Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 34231: //Lunar - Heal Group
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 89)) {
HealGroup(441, 2);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 90) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 90 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a regular Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16201: //Lunar - Grand Attack
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 92)) {
stillgfx(571, absY, absX);
playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 20;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Attack by 20 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 93) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 93 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16202: //Lunar - Grand Strength
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 93)) {
stillgfx(287, absY, absX);
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += 20;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Strength by 20 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 94) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16203: //Lunar - Grand Defence
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 94)) {
stillgfx(465, absY, absX);
playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
playerLevel[1] += 7;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[1]+"", 4008);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Defence by 20 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 95) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 95 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16204: //Lunar - Grand Ranged
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 95)) {
stillgfx(503, absY, absX);
playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
playerLevel[4] += 20;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[4]+"", 4010);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
lunarTimer = 300;
sendMessage(“You boost your Ranged by 20 Levels.”);
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 96) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 96 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16205: //Lunar - Super Heal
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 96)) {
sendMessage(“You regain a mighty 75 Hitpoints.”);
stillgfx(444, absY, absX);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
NewHP += 75;
lunarTimer = 300;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 97) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 97 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16206: //Lunar - Super Heal Group
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 97)) {
SuperHealGroup(444, 2);
lunarTimer = 300;
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 98) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 98 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a boosting Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break;
case 16207: //Lunar - Vengeance
if(lunar_4 == -1) {
if((lunarTimer == 0) && (playerLevel[6] > 98)) {
/int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int EnemyHP = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int EnemyHPExp = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerXP[playerHitpoints];
client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
//actionAmount++;
//setAnimation(playerSEA);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
NewHP -= 5;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
//hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId;
AttackingOn2.inCombat();
setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726)
{
stillgfx(398, absY, absX);
}
AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+10;
if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}
addSkillXP(hitDiff, 3);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff;
//PkingDelay = wepdelay;/
} else if(playerLevel[6] < 99) {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 99 to cast this spell”);
} else if(lunarTimer >= 1) {
sendMessage(“You may only cast a Lunar Spell once every 30 seconds.”);
}
}
break; //use 189 gfx
/code]

now what?
[/code]
